comments:
3.0 M3

I would say that this seems a duplicate of bug 15236. I shared a project that
already existed in the repository. But I didn't synchronize with the view that
opens (the new synchronize view). Instead, I closed it. Now, the project appears
as managed by CVS, by none of its files/folders are.

Then I opened the Old Synchronize view to synchronize the project, and selected
one of the files in the root directory (e.g. a .classpath). In the context menu,
the Team->Show in Resource History action is available, but it seems to do
nothing. However, the following entries are written to the log.
